title: Calories in Bratwurst Sausage
meta_description: Learn calories in bratwurst sausage: about 290 kcal per link, plus protein, fat, carbs, sodium details, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: Pork bratwurst, cooked (grilled or boiled), standard link size (~85 g), no added condiments or bun.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, meat type (pork/beef/veggie), cooking method, and size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cooked bratwurst sausage provides ~290 kcal and ~14 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one bratwurst sausage?
faqs.a: Approximately 290 kcal for a standard cooked pork link.

faqs.q: What's the protein in bratwurst sausage?
faqs.a: About 14 g protein per sausage, mainly from meat.

faqs.q: Are bratwurst sausages high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 800 mg sodium per link due to seasoning.

faqs.q: Calories in bratwurst: grilled vs. boiled?
faqs.a: Similar (~290 kcal); grilling may add slight calories if oil is used.

faqs.q: Do veggie bratwurst have fewer calories?
faqs.a: Often yes, around 200-260 kcal per link depending on brand.
